content: the beginner beanie is an easy and fast crochet beanie pattern it is worked using a super bulky weight yarn and basic crochet stitches the more experienced crocheter will enjoy its simplicity and ease it s one you will make again and again a free written copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported blog https //richtexturescrochet com/beginner-beanie-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level beginner gauge 8 sts x 8 row of half_double_crochet = 4 inches finished size 10 x 9 inches laid flat 20-22 inch circumference to fit an adult head yarn wool-ease ® thick & quick by lion brand ® 80% acrylic 20% wool 5 0 oz 140 g approx 87 yds 80 m super bulky weight 6 1 ball colour shown is coney island hook size l/11 8 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle
